Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (stargateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode 'SK)) (timeToGate (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance gPlayerShip stargateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) )
; Set a timer for when the freighter comes in
(sysAddObjTimerEvent (add timeToGate 300) gSource "OnFreighterArrives" )
; Remember the stargate
(msnSetData gSource 'stargateID (objGetID stargateObj))
; Disable hints (so player does not get instructions to enter ; stargate).
(plyEnableMessage gPlayer 'enabledHints Nil)
; Remember that we accepted this mission
(benedict_missionAccepted gSource) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch ; If we have a freighter ID, then escort it.
(msnGetData gSource 'freighterID) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort)
; Otherwise, point to the stargate
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stargateID)) 'dock) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(block (achievementText)
; Handle result and set Benedict's relationship to the ; player based on it.
(switch
; Player succeeded in defending the freighter
(eq aReason 'success) (block Nil (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidBenedict; 'aid) (setq achievementText 'AchievementSuccess) )
; Player deliberately destroyed freighter
(msnGetData gSource 'playerDestroyedFreighter) (block Nil (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidBenedict; 'betrayal) (rpgCharacterSetStatus &unidFiona; 'dead) (setq achievementText 'AchievementBetrayal) )
; Player failed to defend freighter
(block Nil (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidBenedict; 'failure) (rpgCharacterSetStatus &unidFiona; 'dead) (setq achievementText 'AchievementFailure) ) )
; Achievement
(typSetData &msBenedictAndFiona; 'achievements (list (list (msnTranslate gSource achievementText) Nil "achievements & regrets" ) ) )
; Re-enable hints.
(plyEnableMessage gPlayer 'enabledHints True) )
Events.OnReward:
(block Nil ; Give the player a galactic map
(if (eq (objGetEquipmentStatus gPlayerShip 'GalacticMap) 'notInstalled) (objChangeEquipmentStatus gPlayerShip 'GalacticMap 'install) )
; Player gets mission to visit Korolov
(setq theMission (msnCreate &msBenedictToKorolov; Nil)) (if theMission (msnAccept theMission) )
Nil )
Events.OnFreighterArrives:
(block ( (stargateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stargateID))) (destObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (enemies (list { class:&scAtonement; maxMissiles:4 } { class:&scRepentant; } { class:&scRepentant; } ))
freighterObj )
(plyMessage gPlayer "Freighter arrived!")
; Create the freighter and have it exit the gate towards the sisters
(setq freighterObj (sysCreateShip &scEI7000; stargateObj &svCommonwealth;)) (shpOrder freighterObj 'dock destObj) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource freighterObj) (msnSetData gSource 'freighterID (objGetID freighterObj))
; Create the enemies and set them to attack the freighter
(enum enemies enemyDesc (block (enemyObj) (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip (@ enemyDesc 'class) stargateObj &svPenitents;)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attack freighterObj) (objSetData enemyObj 'mission (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj)
; Set the ships so they don't retreat when shields drop
(shpSetAISetting enemyObj 'ignoreShieldsDown True)
; Atonement only gets a few missiles (otherwise the ; mission is too hard).
(if (@ enemyDesc 'maxMissiles) (enum (objGetItems enemyObj "M") theMissiles (if (gr (itmGetCount theMissiles) (@ enemyDesc 'maxMissiles)) (objRemoveItem enemyObj theMissiles (- (itmGetCount theMissiles) (@ enemyDesc 'maxMissiles))) ) ) ) ) )
(msnSetData gSource 'attackersLeft 3)
; Refresh the target
(msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch (eq (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'playerDestroyedFreighter (and gPlayerShip (eq aOrderGiver gPlayerShip))) (msnFailure gSource) )
(eq (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'mission) (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (block ( (freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID))) attackersLeft )
(setq attackersLeft (msnIncData gSource 'attackersLeft -1))
(switch (not freighterObj) Nil
(eq attackersLeft 0) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource "Freighter:AllClear"))
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource "Freighter:PenitentDestroyed")) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked:
(switch (eq (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil ; Mission success
(msnSuccess gSource)
; Attacking ships retreat
(enum (sysFindObject aObjDocked "sO:attack") enemyObj (shpCancelOrders enemyObj) ) ) )
